d.Name: SAP ERP and SAP S/4HANA Integration with SAP Ariba
d.Description: This Integration package provides integration flows for pass-through communication using a set of robust application programming interfaces (APIs) to simplify exchanging documents between SAP ERP or SAP S/4HANA and SAP Ariba solutions (SAP Business Network, Ariba Sourcing and Ariba Procurement) via SAP Integration Suite, Managed Gateway for Spend Management and SAP Business Network
d.ShortText: Integration between SAP Ariba and SAP ERP and SAP S/4HANA via SAP Integration Suite, Managed Gateway for Spend Management and SAP Business Network
